p: Six main fatty acids were detected in all samples, as expected. In order of decreasing amounts, they are: linoleic (C18:2) > palmitic (C16:0) â‰ˆ oleic (C18:1) > linolenic (C18:3) > stearic (C18:0) > palmitoleic (C16:1). This can be clearly seen from the box plot elaboration reported for each separate year and for the two years together ( Figure 1). This distribution did not change whether considering both years separately or together. Detailed data of fatty acids in all samples are reported in Table 3.
